markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Boots of Bounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=412)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The springy soles of these sturdy leather boots cushion your feet and make each step lighter. These boots give you a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed and a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to High Jump and Long Jump. In addition, when you use the Leap action, you can move 5 feet further if jumping horizontally or 3 feet higher if jumping vertically.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Bounding
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 340 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Bounding (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 4,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus to Speed is +10 feet, and the bonus to High Jump and Long Jump is +3.
name: Boots of Bounding
